alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 18 at 1:39PM MST until February 21 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST SUNDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph. For the High Wind Watch, west winds 45 to 65 mph with gusts up to 85 mph possible. * WHERE...Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 8 AM MST Sunday. For the High Wind Watch, from Sunday morning through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie Range and Southwest Platte County
